info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 9:22AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi TX
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas...
Guadalupe River Near Bloomington affecting Victoria, Refugio and Calhoun Counties.
For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria, Bloomington...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Guadalupe River near Bloomington.
* WHEN...From this evening until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Moderate lowland flooding occurs, with the river reaching well into the flood plain. Any oil tank batteries, pump jacks, and secondary roads near the river may be flooded.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 23.6 feet late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Calhoun, TX; Refugio, TX; Victoria, TX
